apple_vendor_description: This person emoji on Apple devices, featuring a medium-dark skin tone and blond hair, is rendered with Apple's signature attention to detail and smooth, realistic lighting. The blond hair has a natural shine and texture, and the facial features are subtle yet expressive, conveying a sense of friendly neutrality. On Apple devices, this emoji offers a versatile representation for individuals, embodying Apple's commitment to inclusive and beautifully designed digital communication.
